segments.text: Welcome to the Consultancy Department , I'm Greg Wu . What can I assist you with today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to do a credit investigation on another company , but I'm worried it'll be a bit difficult .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's an American company , you see . I'm worried that there will be too much red tape involved .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are able to do credit investigations globally . You have no need to worry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I have been told , by another bank , that it makes it difficult if you want to investigate a company which is registered outside China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 10 years ago , maybe yes . But nowadays we are a global village , it's easy to deal with any foreign country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not exactly prepared right now . How about I go back to the office , get the relevant information and come back before closing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll look forward to it and make sure all of the paperwork is ready and waiting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll return at about 4:30 pm . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
